nodes.bodyText: This assignment of ProjectManager.singleton does not seem to be needed. Perhaps the test could also have a more explanatory name (making it clearer that it relates to extractSpreadSheetId).

We do need ProjectManager.singleton = mock(ProjectManager.class), because GoogleAPIExtension.<clinit> will call ProjectManager.singleton.getPreferenceStore(), which will result in NullPointerException if singleton is null.
I'll write a comment for this in the test.
